title: New mastery sustain
body: Is it just me or do they grant way too much sustain? I was fighting against Poppy as Teemo, and she couldn't do anything. I'd just heal back any trade she did to me.

replies.body: She just had no idea whet she was doing.
Probably not, but it didn't matter if she stunned me on a wall, I'd just shoot her back and kill the minions for free HP.

I assume you're talking about **Grasp of the Undying** not the actually new mastery called Assassin. I don't know why you'd take Grasp of the Undying on Teemo but it's a legit build on tanks ATM. Here's a video explaining it [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0FwXxxgbpD8).
The lifesteal, along with Feast can keep you  in lane forever. Even without grasp of the undying, which I imagine is ridiculous.
